A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The worst Star Wars movie since Phantom. What a mess Ryan Johnson made of our heroes. Leia floating in space\, a pointless mission to a gambling planet\, Snoke easily dispatched and who is he? Rey's parents are huh? Captain Phasma early defeated AGAIN. So many issues. I'm so disappointed in this film. I refuse to accept it as part of Star Wars cannon! Sad!
